Detailed Description

Holds all ship state information for each ship.

State information such as current buttons pressed and health is stored in this class. Other classes that need such information can gain access to it via the public members. Unlike the server version, this also holds information about ascociated drawables and nodes.

Remarks:
An instance of this object holds the state data for each ship in the game. This object should remain general enough to be used by client and server.
FusionClientEnvironment and FusionServerEnvironment have friend access to this class, for efficiant updating.
